full_summary:
**EZ897-240661: Remedial Excavation - Atlin Lots 1 and 2**
================================================================$

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Solicitation Number:** WS4159261955
**Reference Number:** WS4159261955-Doc4159332689

**Background**
------------

The government of Canada has published a tender invitation to Qualify for Remedial Excavation work at Atlin Lots 1 and 2, Atlin, BC. The objective of this project is to remove contaminated soil from the site and transport it for disposal.

**Key Details**
---------------

* Date: 2023-08-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-08T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-26
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Description of the Work**
-------------------------

The Remedial Excavation project at Atlin Lots 1 and 2 involves conducting excavations from property line to property line to a depth of 3 meters below ground surface (mbgs). Select locations will require excavations to depths of 4 mbgs and 7 mbgs. The contaminants identified in the fill soil and native soil include arsenic, barium, cadmium, copper, lead, nickel, and zinc. Contractors will be required to remove the contaminated soil and transport it for disposal.

**Business Requirements**
------------------------

* Remediating metals contamination in soil
* Removing and transporting contaminated soil for disposal
* Compliance with relevant regulations and standards
* Capability to provide environmental management services

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Ken Ngan, ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Tender Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17270482
* Bid information and documents can be found on the above URL

Note: This tender invitation has been EXPIRED; this is for informational purposes only. Interested contractors can check the above URL for any new notices or follow up opportunities.
